name: Hello, World!
description: Write a program that prompts for your name and prints a greeting

name: Counting Characters
description: Write a program that prints a string and the number of characters that string contains

name: Printing Quotes
description: Write a program that recieves a quote and author and renders a formatted output

name: Mad Libs
description: Write a simple mad-lib program that recieves input and formats output

name: Simple Math
description: Write a program that recieves two numbers and outputs their sum, difference, product, and quotient.

name: Retirement Calculator
description: Write a program that calculates how many years you have until retirement based on your age

name: Area of a Room
description: Write a program that calculates the area of a room

name: Pizza Party
description: Write a program evenly divides a pizza pie based on the number of people, pizzas, and slices per pizza.

name: Paint Calculator
description: Write a program that calculates the amoutn of paint needed to paint the ceiling of a room.

name: Self-Checkout
description: Create a simple self-checkout system that calculates the subtotal, tax, and total of three items.
